description:
Adding a google calendar will generate the error "Could not sync calendars: Invalid ICAL event format"

App looks simple and clean, exactly what I was looking for, but not being able to use it with a google calendar is a deal-breaker.
summary: Promising but not working with Google Calendars

description: Everything works great, but I wish it had a year view option as well

The layout is basically good, but the use of faint gray fonts and hairline grey lines is hard to read. Change to Black on white, and thicker lines.

You can't scroll through the months.

It's unreadable for older people without reading glasses.
